result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture

Set up the browser and connect to selenium

The server is located at localhost
The server is on port 4444

comment
These commands tell the browser how to start
They are commented out because we've already called them above in the Setup Fixture
Using the browser browser start at URL
In addition there are a number of short cut methods for starting a specific browser
using firefox start at URL
using explorer start at URL
using explorer in HTA mode start at URL
using chrome start at URL
And to close the browser
close the browser

Run through browser buttons
